entry.data:
SUNNY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 70S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS AROUND 80
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
CALM WINDS

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
CALM WINDS, BECOMING NORTH AROUND 5 MPH IN THE AFTERNOON

CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
